articles.description: Both the Galaxy A15 and A25 5G feature a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED Display, offering improved screen visibility even in direct sunlight.
articles.content:
Samsung introduces its latest lineup, the Galaxy A15 5G and A25 5G, now hitting the stores in the Philippines. Orders placed until March 31, 2024, will receive a complimentary 25W Travel Adapter.
